item.title: 1. Introduction
item.description: 1. Features # • Online location monitoring • Track & review moving history • 4G & LTE CAT1 network connection • Monitor movement speed, maximum speed • Turn on & off the Defense remotely to help protect and prevent theft • Turn off Defense with PIN code when the car is offline • Automatically prevent forgetting to turn off the Smartkey lock knob to help protect the battery and prevent theft

item.title: 2. Overview
item.description: 1. Components # 2. Packaging # G400 set with power cord integrated relay G400 set with standard power cord 3. LED indicators # LED Color Status Detail Description Satellite Blue Light slow flashing Good signal, can update location in real time Light without flashing Searching for Positioning signal Light fast flashing GNSS module in sleep mode Network 4G Red Light slow flashing Server connected successfully Light without flashing Data network registered and data server connection in progress Light fast flashing Server connection failed 4.

item.title: 3. SimCard
item.description: SIM card must be registered for 4G package. Before inserting the SIM card, make sure that external power is disconnected from the device. Find the slot and remove the SIM cover Insert the SIM card into the device Warning The copper side of the SIM will face down and the bevel angle of the SIM will be in the same direction as G400 wire side

item.title: 4. Installation
item.description: Location The location needs to ensure good reception, less damage from external factors, metal shielding 4.1 Installing G400 with power cord set integrated RELAY # 4.1.1 Steps for installation # Step 1 Insert Sim into the G400 device according to the instructions in section 3 Step 2 Connect the standard power cord set to the vehicle Black wire: Connect the negative pole on the battery Red wire: Connect the positive pole on the battery Yellow wire: Connect to RELAY to turn on/off the vehicle’s power supply Orange wire: Connect the vehicle’s electric lock signal wire, positive pole Step 3 Connect the G400 device to a standard power cord
